item.title: Music Vision Sound
item.description:
Music Vision Sound

What techniques and tools do you use to keep yourself organized? I use the passion as my technique, I don´t work with expensive tools or programs with my art everything digital or handmade it´s the product of the creativity and that inner wish to go beyond every day.

item.title: Drywall Worker Creates Stunning 3D Art Using Only Joint Compound
item.description:
Drywall Worker Creates Stunning 3D Art Using Only Joint Compound

Bernie Mitchell is not just another drywall contractor. Based in Ontario, Canada, he uses his knowledge to sculpt intricate 3D murals. Employing joint compound, he creates stunning nature-themed sculptures on drywall, featuring birds, horses, wolves and dogs. Mitchell began experimenting with drywall in the early 1990s. He was playing with raised surfaces and light.

item.title: Electrical Engineer Creates 3D Calligraphy That Leaps Off The Page
item.description:
Electrical Engineer Creates 3D Calligraphy That Leaps Off The Page

Previously featured Tolga Girgin, a Turkish electrical engineer and graphic designer, continues to create stunning 3D calligraphy pieces. By experimenting with perspective and shading, Girgin's colorful pieces seem to be ready to peel off the page at any time! "My wife Zeynep encouraged me to start calligraphy," Girgin told Calligraphy Masters.

item.title: I Create Realistic Birds From Paper
item.description:
I Create Realistic Birds From Paper

I make ultra realistic birds from thin paper. Each model takes weeks to design, coloration is painted with watercolor.

item.title: Interactive Light And Sound Installation Lets You Compose Music
item.description:
Interactive Light And Sound Installation Lets You Compose Music

Design agency HUSH created an interactive audiovisual installation that uses prisms, light and sound to represent the interplay of ideas between our designers, architects, musicians, and technologists. By arranging the prisms across a surface designed to bend and reflect light, users build a glowing, colourful visual array.
